mapper.insert: insert into temp_tb (temp_date, temp_editor, temp_contentsId) values (#{date}, #{editor}, #{contentsId})
mapper.select: select temp_date date, temp_editor editor, temp_contentsId contentsId from temp_tb where temp_contentsId=#{contentsId}
